mainfeatures: 16.0 Mega pixels (interpolation), 5M CMOS sensor Support 120x Zoom ( 12x Optical zoom and 10x digital zoom) Tamron® optical lens 3.5 Inch TFT LCD Touch Display (16:9) High definition 1080p (30fps) video recording Dual SDHC card slot up to 2 x 16GB Class External microphone output (Excluding microphone)
specifications: Image Sensor: 5.0 CMOS Mega Pixels Sensor Max pixels: 16.0 Mega pixels (interpolation) Storage Media: Internal: Built-in 128MB flash Storage slot: Dual SD Card slot (Per card up to SDHC 16GB) Sensor Sensitivity: AUTO Lens: 12x Optical zoom lens Wide: F1.85,f=6.3mm Tele: F3.1,f=75.6mm Focus Range: Normal: Wide 10cm~inf, Tele: 90cm~inf Shutter: Still: 1/2-1/2000, Video:1/30-1/2000 Still Image: Image File Format:JPEG,DCF Image Resolution: 16M (interpolation), 10M (interpolation), 5M, 2M Movie Clip: Movie File Format:H.264(AVI) Movie Resolution: WQVGA(240fps), WVGA(30fps), 720P(30fps/60fps), 1080P(1920x1080)@30fps Movie zoom: 12x Optical zoom,10x digital zoom Camera zoom: 12x Optical zoom,10x digital zoom Display LCD Monitor: 3.5 Inch TFT touch screen LCD, 270 degree rotation Strobe(Camera): Mode: Auto/Forced/Off White Balance: Auto/Sunny/Cloudy/Tungsten/Fluorescent Self-Timer: 5 sec./10 sec./Off Interface: USB 2.0 high speed/HDMI/AV TV-Out: NTSC/PAL/HDMI OSD languages: English / Japanese / French / Italian / Spanish / Portuguese / German / Simplified Chinese / Traditional Chinese / Korean / Turkish / Russian / Dutch / Arabic Power Source: 3.7V/1700mAh Li-ion battery Size: 135 x 63.5 x 63.5mm Weight: 383g (Without battery)
packagecontents: 1 x Digital video camera HD-120T 1 x Li-ion Battery 1 x USB Cable 1 x AV Cable 1 x HDMI Cable 1 x 100-240v Battery Charger 1 x Software CD 1 x Camera Pouch 1 x User manual
